snippet: The magazine company’s chief executive, Joseph A. Ripp, said strong performance in digital advertising helped offset drops in print advertising and circulation.
abstract: Time Inc reports third-quarter profit of $48 million, compared with $68 million in year-ago quarter; revenue rose slightly to $821 million from $818 million in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: The magazine company’s chief executive, Joseph A. Ripp, said strong performance in digital advertising helped offset drops in print advertising and circulation.

headline.main: Digital Ads Lift 3rd-Quarter Revenue at Time Inc.
headline.print_headline: Digital Ads Lift 3rd-Quarter Revenue at Time Inc.
